name: Look Into The Lost Eyes (Zaharuna Springfferlens)
name_original: Look Into The Lost Eyes (Zaharuna Springfferlens)
description:
Thank you for your help! Music by CROWMUSIC
Eng.Description:

People have built a pizzeria of Head Spinners,

don't ask why, you know yourself, 

that spinners have been out of trend for a long time.

One person made 4 animatronics that

have a "SPINNER" instead of a head.

Senior, Middle, Junior and Middle.

In two words - brothers and one sister.

BUT, this pizzeria hyped up, cool,

now spinners are also on trend.

The hype lasted for a very long time,

but these pioneers had some problems...

But what happened next, 

we'll find out now.
